content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":134411,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人でも最強だ","translatedEnglishLine":"Even among Mazin, it's the strongest."},{"lineNumber":134412,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":134413,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それでも……","translatedEnglishLine":"Even so..."},{"lineNumber":134414,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やるしかないのは変わらないがな……","translatedEnglishLine":"There's no change; we have no choice but to do it..."},{"lineNumber":134415,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":134416,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス……","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance..."},{"lineNumber":134417,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私は今回の作戦、反対です","translatedEnglishLine":"I am against this operation."},{"lineNumber":134418,"originalJapaneseLine":"「厳重な警備の中を正面突破は……","translatedEnglishLine":"Breaking through the heavy security head-on..."},{"lineNumber":134419,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あまりに無茶が過ぎます……","translatedEnglishLine":"That's far too reckless..."},{"lineNumber":134420,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今ならまだ引き返すことも……","translatedEnglishLine":"We can still turn back now..."},{"lineNumber":134421,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふん","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmph."},{"lineNumber":134422,"originalJapaneseLine":"「難攻不落の要塞がなんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"What’s so great about an impregnable fortress?"},{"lineNumber":134423,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大量の魔物兵がなんだ、厳重な警備がなんだ、","translatedEnglishLine":"What about the hordes of monster soldiers? What about the tight security?"},{"lineNumber":134424,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケイブリスがなんだ、魔人がなんだ","translatedEnglishLine":"What about Kavebris? What about Mazin?"},{"lineNumber":134425,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここまで来て誰が引き返すか","translatedEnglishLine":"Who would turn back now, after coming this far?"},{"lineNumber":134426,"originalJapaneseLine":"「真っ直ぐカミーラ城に突っ込み、","translatedEnglishLine":"We’ll charge straight into Camilla’s castle,"},{"lineNumber":134427,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケイブリスをブッ殺す","translatedEnglishLine":"and kill Kavebris."},{"lineNumber":134428,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そしてついでにカミーラとも一発する","translatedEnglishLine":"And while we're at it, I'll get a round with Camilla too."},{"lineNumber":134429,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、これが俺様の作戦だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahaha! This is my plan!"},{"lineNumber":134430,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……それは作戦とは言いません」","translatedEnglishLine":"...That isn’t called a plan."},{"lineNumber":134431,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むう、クルックーの割に","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, for a Klukku,"},{"lineNumber":134432,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今回は強情じゃないか","translatedEnglishLine":"you’re pretty stubborn this time."},{"lineNumber":134433,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":134434,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私は……","translatedEnglishLine":"I..."},{"lineNumber":134435,"originalJapaneseLine":"「安心しろ、俺様が戦う以上、勝利以外はありえん。","translatedEnglishLine":"Don’t worry, as long as I fight, nothing but victory is possible."},{"lineNumber":134436,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今までもそうだった","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s always been that way."},{"lineNumber":134437,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうだな、シィル","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s right, Sealed."},{"lineNumber":134438,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは……","translatedEnglishLine":"That is..."},{"lineNumber":134439,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、ランス様は……","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, Lord Rance..."},{"lineNumber":134440,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつもこんな時……勝ってきました","translatedEnglishLine":"He’s always won in times like this."},{"lineNumber":134441,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Indeed."},{"lineNumber":134442,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺達は戦わなきゃならん。","translatedEnglishLine":"We have to fight."},{"lineNumber":134443,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そうだな、サテラ","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s right, Satella."},{"lineNumber":134444,"originalJapaneseLine":"「当然だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Of course."},{"lineNumber":134445,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そして、勝つべきは……サテラ達の方だ","translatedEnglishLine":"And the ones who should win are... Satella and the others."},{"lineNumber":134446,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes."},{"lineNumber":134447,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なにより……","translatedEnglishLine":"Above all..."},{"lineNumber":134448,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ホーネットとヤル為には、","translatedEnglishLine":"To have a chance with Hornet,"},{"lineNumber":134449,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここでいいとこ見せなきゃならんからな！","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ve got to show off here!"},{"lineNumber":134450,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それが理由か！」","translatedEnglishLine":"So that’s the reason!"},{"lineNumber":134451,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはははははは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":134452,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう……ランス様……","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh... Lord Rance..."},{"lineNumber":134453,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……恨みますよ……","translatedEnglishLine":"Haa... I curse you..."},{"lineNumber":134454,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":134455,"originalJapaneseLine":"クルックーの視線を受けて尚、","translatedEnglishLine":"Even under Klukku’s stare,"},{"lineNumber":134456,"originalJapaneseLine":"ホーネットは表情を崩さず話を続ける。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hornet continued speaking without breaking her expression."},{"lineNumber":134457,"originalJapaneseLine":"「選択肢はそう多くありません」","translatedEnglishLine":"There aren’t many choices."},{"lineNumber":134458,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ただ、戦い、勝つ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Simply, fight and win."},{"lineNumber":134459,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それだけです」","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s all there is."},{"lineNumber":134460,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……そろそろ行きましょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"...It’s about time to go."}]}

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even among Mazin, it's the strongest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やるしかないのは変わらないがな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no change; we have no choice but to do it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は今回の作戦、反対です
「厳重な警備の中を正面突破は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Breaking through the heavy security head-on...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あまりに無茶が過ぎます……
「今ならまだ引き返すことも……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can still turn back now...
What’s so great about an impregnable fortress?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大量の魔物兵がなんだ、厳重な警備がなんだ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What about the hordes of monster soldiers? What about the tight security?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスがなんだ、魔人がなんだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What about Kavebris? What about Mazin?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここまで来て誰が引き返すか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Who would turn back now, after coming this far?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「真っ直ぐカミーラ城に突っ込み、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’ll charge straight into Camilla’s castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスをブッ殺す
「そしてついでにカミーラとも一発する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And while we're at it, I'll get a round with Camilla too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、これが俺様の作戦だ！」
「……それは作戦とは言いません」
今回は強情じゃないか
「安心しろ、俺様が戦う以上、勝利以外はありえん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don’t worry, as long as I fight, nothing but victory is possible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつもこんな時……勝ってきました
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He’s always won in times like this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、勝つべきは……サテラ達の方だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And the ones who should win are... Satella and the others.
To have a chance with Hornet,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここでいいとこ見せなきゃならんからな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ve got to show off here!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーの視線を受けて尚、
ホーネットは表情を崩さず話を続ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hornet continued speaking without breaking her expression.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「選択肢はそう多くありません」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
